publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3794# Dennis Canavan: Safeway's Support for Scottish Football—That the Parliament notes the bids being made to take over Safeway and asks that any prospective buyer give a firm commitment to continue the existing arrangements between Safeway and the Scottish Football Association for sponsorship of the Scottish football team and continue to support the development of youth football and the provision of a match ticket distribution network through local stores.

S1M-3794# Safeway's Support for Scottish Football (lodged on 22 January 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bill Butler*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Kay Ullrich*, Irene McGugan*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Fiona McLeod*, Michael Matheson*, Karen Gillon*

S1M-3794# Dennis Canavan: Safeway's Support for Scottish Football—That the Parliament notes the bids being made to take over Safeway and asks that any prospective buyer give a firm commitment to continue the existing arrangements between Safeway and the Scottish Football Association for sponsorship of the Scottish football team and continue to support the development of youth football and the provision of a match ticket distribution network through local stores.Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Jackie Baillie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bill Butler, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Gil Paterson, Kay Ullrich, Irene McGugan, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Fiona McLeod, Michael Matheson, Karen Gillon, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Robin Harper*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Tavish Scott*, Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-3794# Safeway's Support for Scottish Football (lodged on 22 January 2003) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr John McAllion*
S1M-3794 Safeway's Support for Scottish Football (lodged on 22 January 2003) Ian Jenkins*, Alex Neil*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-3794 Safeway's Support for Scottish Football (lodged on 22 January 2003) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3794 Dennis Canavan: Safeway's Support for Scottish Football—That the Parliament notes the bids being made to take over Safeway and asks that any prospective buyer give a firm commitment to continue the existing arrangements between Safeway and the Scottish Football Association for sponsorship of the Scottish football team and continue to support the development of youth football and the provision of a match ticket distribution network through local stores. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Jackie Baillie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bill Butler, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Gil Paterson, Kay Ullrich, Irene McGugan, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Fiona McLeod, Michael Matheson, Karen Gillon, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Tavish Scott, Bristow Muldoon, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr John McAllion, Ian Jenkins, Alex Neil, Scott Barrie, Donald Gorrie
